dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form

Interface ISWTWidget

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SWTBrowser, SWTButton, SWTCheckBox, SWTComboBox, SWTGroup, SWTLabel, SWTTable, SWTText, SWTTreeTable

    public interface ISWTWidget
    This is a base interface that all widgets should implement for convenience.

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2008.b
